name: Hijack Legit RDP Session to Move Laterally
description: Detects the usage of tsclient share to place a backdoor on the RDP source machine's startup folder
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\mstsc.exe AND file.path:*\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Start\ Menu\\Programs\\Startup\\*)`
